name: World in Peril
description:
World in Peril is a one player card game about surviving the perils of the world throughout history.

Managing your civilization, you have a goal set for achieving your supremacy (Defense, Science, Development and Economic). Achieving your goal, means gathering 7 cards of that type.

As you buy cards on one type, buying the others will be cheaper, but buying the other types will become more expensive.

Each type also have benefits:

Defense will protect other buildings aswell as development.

Science will bring you better vision of the future.

Protecting development is imperative as reaching zero means you lose.

Economic cards will bring you more money when you discard one card.

Try it out and tell me what you think!
